page.title: 09Recreation.Survey Data.
page.content: Data sent to 45 families. Facilities frequently used:- parks & community centres. Most belong to a club:- Stone- house Gang, Working-mens club. Favourite pastimes:- watching T.V. Others- radio stereo, gardening. 89% play a musical instrument. All families have radio & T.V. 10% have computers. Daily average family viewing is 6hrs. Families go out together once a week. 30% of families holiday outside area- most popular- Spain & Wales. Bank Holidays- 50% visit relatives. Children play in parks, gardens & streets. Games played- ball games & bike riding. Favourite indoors- watching TV, drawing & reading. 10% attend classes once a week- dancing, swimming & horse riding. Families would like a supervised play area for 5-10yrs, entertainments for 14-16 yrs, swimming-pool & football pitches.
